name: Feat one
description: Kipit has extensive features that enables automated and self payment of bills on schedule and issuing of reminders

name: Feat Two
description: Keep track of every expense from your wallet, cards, e.t.c by logging on kipit.

name: Feat Three
description: Create and update budget from an analysis of expense using our our analytic tools.

name: Feat Four
description: Kipit provides updates on account status and generates summary reports over a specified period.

name: Feat Six
description: kipit monitors the market and provides useful tips on investments from trusted sources.
